about_the_game:
The fall of Elysium and Tharsis has brought about a shift in the corporate world. Now standing at the top, Howell-Barrex Incorporated is now the dominant corporation. You will play as the Strike Commander, and follow the story of Edward Howell, General Barrex, and the IRON HAWKS.

The war with STROL is about to begin, but it will be a short one as Howell-Barrex Inc. brings an impressive array of firepower to the table.

Firepower Superiority!

(Please note, you can join another player’s Howell-Barrex Inc. content without owning it. But you cannot host a Howell-Barrex Inc. campaign without owning the DLC.)

NEW CONTENT:

  • NEW CAMPAIGN STORY
    Experience a new story line with new characters and settings. Take on the role as the Strike Commander and bring victory to Howell-Barrex Inc. Enjoy 11 new story campaign missions, 28 additional missions, 13 new prefab variations and 8 new maps.
  • UBAS (UNIVERSAL BIPEDAL ARMOURED SYSTEM)
    UBAS is a combat exoskeleton with a wide range of firepower and survivability options. Become the walking tank you were meant to be.
  • ENGINEER SUIT
    The Engineer suit is a master of creating new tactical options and bunkering up. When combined with a UBAS, a powerful combination is born.
  • NEW TECH TREE
    A new tech tree will bring improvements to the UBAS and the Engineer suit. You will also have a new super weapon, a new Headquarters mechanic, and various other technologies at your disposal.

content_descriptors.notes: Blood from killing creatures and player deaths.
